title: Winner at GDG Hackatonic 2025
description: Secured 1st place out of 111 teams at PSG iTech, Coimbatore. Built GeoSense, a geospatial intelligence solution, during a 24-hour hackathon organized by Google Developer Groups.

title: Runner up at Smart India Hackathon 2024
description: Finalist at SIH Grand Finale held by Ministry of Education, GoI. Developed LINGUA, an ISL-to-speech and speech-to-ISL translation solution addressing diverse societal use cases. Secured runner-up position after a 36-hour development sprint.
